trends: There have been no other sightings in Burntwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: We got out of the car looked up and saw the lights directly above us
divs: sighting detailswe had just got back home from birmingham, as we got out the car i looked up as i felt drawn to something. there isnt much light pollution at the back of our house and me and my fiancee both witnessed 6-7 disk shaped \ circular objects flying directly above us in a north east direction, there was a very very slight hum other than that the objects were silent i watched 1 moving side to side whilst travelling forward and another moved up and down, the movement of these craft were nothing ive seen before on our 'military' planes, i have seen 'military' jets travelling above our home in a westerly direction, which was about 2 weeks before this. directly after the craft sighting on 22\11\2013 we saw what seemed to be a passenger plane flying in a different direction at a similiar altitude, these objects were 2-3 times the size and travelled at a ridiculoud speed! we have seen various sightings over cannock chase over the last few years but this was the most clear cut! this is the first time ive seen a ufo and felt worried, i felt their movements were of an aggressive nature.... coincidentally they were flying towards cannock chase
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
